compatibility.notes: The Unicode-TOU license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses that impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Users must comply with the Terms and Conditions specified in the Unicode Terms of Use.
For specific data files like the Unicode Character Database, refer to Exhibit 1 for additional rights and restrictions.
For book editions of the Unicode Standard, refer to the back of the title page for rights and restrictions.
license.name: Unicode-TOU
obligations: Modification is permitted only for documents/files that explicitly state so.
All copies of the Unicode Terms of Use document must be verbatim.
No mirroring of the Unicode website is allowed if a fee is charged.
